data.text: @Minter_tainment Hello @Minter_tainment , Thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines. We sincerely apologize on what you experience during your flight. Kindly send us a DM of your 6-digit confirmation code so we can look into this for you. -Iah

@SnoTechTom Hello @SnoTechTom, Thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines and for letting us know your concern. We're sorry to hear about your flight experience. Kindly send us a DM of your 6-digit confirmation code and the name of the passenger(s) so we can look into this for you. -Iah

@RepolaRachael Hello @RepolaRachael, We appreciate you get in contact with us. I´m sorry to hear about this emergency that came up. Please send us a DM with the 6 digit confirmation and the complete name of the passenger to look into this for you please? - Wilson
@_skyl Hello @_skyl, Thank you for contacting Frontier Airlines. We're sorry to hear about your web experience. Kindly send us a DM so we can assist you further. -Iah

@danilauraxo Hi @danilauraxo, thanks for reaching out! Iam sorry you have had this experience. Please share with us your 6-digit confirmation code along the full passenger's name through DM for further assistance. - Salvador
@superplaneyogin We apologize for the delayed response. Please send us a DM and tell us more about your concern so we can look into this for you. -Rei
@jnesshel We apologize for the delayed response. Please send us a DM and tell us more about your concern so we can look into this for you. -Rei
@juuuyaa_rose Good morning @juuuyaa_rose (Julia), thank you for reaching out today. You can contact us with a DM trough Messenger.- Rebeca
